home.title: Citrus Simulator
home.like: If you like Citrus and the Simulator, don't forget to give us a star on

disclaimer.title: Disclaimer!
disclaimer.introduction: We are excited to announce that the Simulator UI has been comprehensively updated in our latest 3.0.0 release. This marks a significant advancement for our development team. The updated UI adheres to current best practices, utilizes up-to-date dependencies, and features well-structured, formatted, and thoroughly tested code. This transformation not only brings the project back to a state of sustainable maintainability but also allows us to roll out updates and new releases more swiftly.
disclaimer.experience: However, for our valued users, these changes may present a different experience from the previous UI. The interface now sports a fresh look, and you might notice alterations in behavior. Additionally, some functionalities might differ from those in earlier versions, impacting the UI's interaction.
disclaimer.feedback: We greatly appreciate your feedback and suggestions!
disclaimer.closingNote: Especially regarding features or aspects you might miss from the previous versions. As we continue to enhance the simulator, please remember that much of this work is a labor of love, carried out in our spare time. Our commitment to citrus stems from our belief in its potential and our desire to provide you with the best possible tools for software development. We kindly ask for your constructive and respectful feedback to help us improve further.
